A '''ring of nondetection''' made it impossible to detect the whereabouts of a person, i.e. via [[nondetection]], who wore the ring.
document_data.Appearance: Rings of nondetection were normally made of plain [[gold]]. Such rings could be found for sale in [[Ravens Bluff]].
document_data.History: [[Alusair Obarskyr]] wore a ring of nondetection for years, to avoid being found by the wizard [[Vangerdahast]].
